sub-events.comment: SpriteFont UID 2 is the Loading text
ArrowButton UID 13 is the Left Button
ArrowButton UID 14 is the Right Button
SpriteFont UID 17 is the Back text
SpriteFont UID 18 is the Select text
Lock the SelectedCarID so it cannot go below 0
Set the text to Locked for ID above 2 (since I only got 2 cars so far)
Set car name to each corresponding ID
ArrowButton UID 23 is the Left Button
ArrowButton UID 24 is the Right Button
SpriteFont UID 26 is the Back text
SpriteFont UID 27 is the Select text
Lock the SelectedTrackID so it cannot go below 0
Set the text to Locked for ID above 2
Set track name to each corresponding ID
